h3.span: Welcome to Cobre Consolidated School District

div.div:
"Based on the belief that every individual can learn and succeed; the Cobre Consolidated School communities are committed to helping each learner reach his/her potential toward becoming a productive and fulfilled member of society."
We are Committed to Excellence." We work hard to make the site a primary source for timely information for all users, and a main gateway for improved communication between parents, teachers, students and other members of our community. Please be advised that we are transitioning to this new web-site and plan to have all pertinent information available as soon as possible.
